p.s: In his speech on the World Leaders' Summit Opening Ceremony, held on the Nov. 1, 2021 Boris Johnson addresses is the climate change and the duty to act now.
Boris Johnson seize the climate crisis as a huge danger for the current and following generations.
Furthermore he states that the COP26 in Glasgow needs to be the moment where the world reacts and starts to change things.
He is Full of hope that using the money of the industrialized countries will help all countries to achieve their climate aims.
In addition he tells the audience the responsibility they have to do for future generations.
Due to this responsibility the COP26 in Glasgow needs to be the stars for taking action in order to achieve to ristain the rise in the temperature of the planet to 1.5 degree.
He makes clear that all assumptions to react against climate change like NGOs and corporations are already theirthere and just need to be used correctly.
At the end he underlines his message of the importance of a reaction to the climate crisis and tells the audience that he is full of hope that the COP26 can be the beginning of this necessary change.
